data.title: Twitter Is The Latest Company To Make Election Day A Paid Holiday
data.text: More companies are giving U.S. employees a day off to cast their ballots.

data.title: Twitter flags another Trump tweet for 'threat of harm'
data.text: The company placed a notice over Trump's tweet for violating its rules.

data.title: Another Tweet From Trump Gets a Label From Twitter
data.text: The president threatened “serious force” if protesters tried to set up an autonomous zone in Washington, D.C., as they have in Seattle.

data.title: Twitter will give employees Election Day off
data.text: Twitter will give its US employees the day off to vote on Election Day starting this year, the company announced in an internal email to all staff on Tuesday.

data.title: Twitter Slaps Label On Donald Trump Tweet For Violating Rules About “Abusive Behavior”
data.text: Twitter slapped a label on another one of President Donald Trump’s tweets on Tuesday, concluding that it violated its rules about “abusive behavior.” Earlier in the day, Trump tweeted that “there will never be an ‘Autonomous Zone’ in Washington, D.C., as long as I’m your President. If they try they will be met with serious

data.title: Twitter flagged another Trump tweet for violating its policies
data.text: Twitter said Trump violated its policies against abusive behavior with a tweet including a "threat of harm against an identifiable group."

data.title: Twitter Flags Trump Tweet For Violating ‘Abusive Behavior’ Guidelines
data.text: Trump tweeted Tuesday that protesters will be met with “serious force” if they establish an autonomous zone near the White House.

data.title: Twitter places public interest notice on Trump tweet for violating policy against abusive behavior
data.text: CNBC's Julia Boorstin reports that Twitter has flagged yet another one of President Trump's tweets after the company said it violated its policy against abusive behavior.

data.title: Twitter hides another Trump tweet for 'threat of harm'
data.text: The president has violated another Twitter policy.

data.title: Twitter flags another Trump tweet, about using 'serious force'
data.text: Twitter Inc. TWTR, -2.12% on Tuesday flagged another tweet by President Donald Trump, this time about a comment on using "serious force" against what Trump called an "Autonomous Zone" in Washington.

data.title: Twitter puts warning on Trump tweet for "threat of harm" against DC protesters
data.text: Twitter on Tuesday put a warning label on a tweet from President Donald Trump in which he warned if protesters tried to set up an "autonomous zone" in Washington DC they would be "met with serious force!"

data.title: Tech leaders slam Trump’s temporary work visa ban
data.text: Leaders from across U.S. technology industry are condemning new restrictions on employment-based visas imposed by President Donald Trump this week.

data.title: Tech Giants Face Advertisement Challenges Amid Coronavirus
data.text: Coronavirus led sluggish advertising spending is taking toll on the tech giants like Alphabet's (GOOGL) Google, Facebook and Twitter.

data.title: Twitter says some business users had their pivate data exposed
data.text: Flip the “days since the last Twitter security incident” back to zero. Twitter said Tuesday that it has emailed its business customers, such as those who advertise on the site, to warn that their information may have been compromised in a security lapse.

data.title: How COVID-19 Has Changed Cybersecurity
data.text: Cybersecurity products are seeing rapid adoption and their stocks have also done well -- is this all sustainable?
